abstract: Soccer Roundup; Leicester City defeats Everton, 3-1; other soccer scores noted.

headline.print_headline: Leicester Caps Celebrations With a Win

snippet: Jamie Vardy scored twice as Leicester produced a swaggering 3-1 victory over Everton in its first match as the English Premier League champion before collecting the trophy on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Vardy scored twice as Leicester produced a swaggering 3-1 victory over Everton in its first match as the English Premier League champion before collecting the trophy on Saturday.
